page.title: 01BURBAGE and the area nearby
page.content: The area lies 12 miles south west of Leicester,close to Hinckley and the Warwickshire border.The M69 Motorway crosses the bloc and the main railway line,Leicester to Birmingham touches the northwest corner.Major and minor roads complete the transport network. The population is concentrated in Burbage,a suburb of Hinckley but which retains an historical building core dating from 1580.Aston Flamville,1\km. east of Burbage is a small village with houses and farms along two roads but no school or shop.About one third of the village of Sharnford,1\km.south east of Aston Flamville lies in the bloc.Over a dozen farms provide the remaining population. Although bus services do exist, personal transport is essential.Most of the area is mixed farmland.Part of the northern edge is decidous woodland
